snippet.title: Tanuki No Tabi Trailer - Singapore Polytechnic Graduation Showcase 2019
snippet.description:
Taunki No Tabi (Tanuki's Journey) is a top-down, action-adventure shooter in a world featuring three clans, the Tanuki, the Saru and the Kitsune. Each individual species has an unique ability blessed upon a selected few by the Gods. The blessings obtained helps the races to prosper and live together peacefully. You get to play as Kotarou, a Tanuki that seeks to grow stronger and rescue his sister from the Kitsune who became greedy for power. Explore the world and earn gifts from the gods scattered across the land!

Download link:
https://mtotatm.itch.io/tanuki-no-tabi
More Details:
https://mtotatm.wixsite.com/tinyinfinity/tanuki-no-tabi

Our Sound designer
https://soundcloud.com/loozhonghan/tanuki-no-tabi-forest​

Featured on the Crowbar Award 2019
https://www.brandinginasia.com/the-crowbar-awards-2019-announces-finalists/
https://www.crowbar.com.sg/pdf/2019%20Crowbar%20Winners%20By%20School.pdf

Featured on Singapore Polytechnic Spirit Magazine 2019 Page 15, https://www.sp.edu.sg/docs/default-source/publications/spirit/spirit_290419.pdf

Featured and review on Softpedia's database
https://games.softpedia.com/get/Freeware-Games/Tanuki-no-Tabi.shtml

Featured and review on JJ LABO
https://jj-labo.seesaa.net/article/tanuki-no-tabi.html
